name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 6: A Portal to Mystery
name_original: Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 6: A Portal to Mystery
description:
Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 6: A Portal to Mystery is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games and Mojang. It was originally released in 2016. Telltale Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 6: A Portal to Mystery is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
